title: BTC_Mouse
author: BTC_Mouse
content: This week's top cryptocurrency market news may be found below. 👇👇 📍 NEWS:▪️  Binance launched the new Binance Options trading platform on Sep 13.▪️  Tether's USDT stablecoin launches on the NEAR blockchain.▪️ A South Korean court issued an arrest warrant for  Do Kwon, CEO of Terraform Labs.📍 NFTS: ▪️  Merriam-Webster adds ‘Metaverse’ and ‘Altcoin’ to the dictionary in Nod to Crypto.▪️ Fortnite creator  Epic Games releases the first NFT game on its store.▪️  Singapore's biggest bank DBS to acquire land in The Sandbox metaverse.📍 TECHNOLOGY▪️  The Ethereum Merge is done, opening a new era for the second-biggest blockchain.📍 HACK▪️   Aussies already lost $242M to investment and crypto scams in 2022.📍 FUNDRAISING▪️ Web3 developer platform  Alchemy is raising $12 million for a venture capital fund.▪️  NEAR Foundation launches $100 million VC fund and lab for web3.Source :  REDKITE
